attributes.action: MP'S shouldn't undermine British Forces upholding British or International Law.
attributes.background: Politicians who justify terrorism against British and International law discredit the service personnel up holding it and give credence to terrorism. Prolonging and stopping terrorist organisations from negotiating adding to the violence and death on both sides of the conflict.

rejection.details: We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  Individual MPs are responsible for their own views and opinions.
